Text: Odd... my tracker says I'm seeding this, and yet TPB doesn't claim there are any seeders! I'm on http://tracker.torrentbay.to:6969/announce , specifically.
The index system can be off and/or slow at times. Please be patient and the seeds will show :)

Hmm, it's still displaying zero seeders and leechers, even though I see one of each on my end. Oh well, there's an easy fix: to anyone thinking about downloading this torrent, don't trust the numbers. The most recent version of this torrent always has at least one seed!
